description: Policeman Jonathan Collins warns officers Jacob Matthias and Adam Gosett that if they don't foil the capers of the graffiti artists, their operation will be eighty-sixed....it's time to get serious.  In an effort to show their superior just how serious they are, Adam and Jacob drop to their knees and begin servicing Collins.  In this session of sucking, rimming, probing and fucking,  these three studs show their dedication to hot mansex.
title: Hungarian Graffiti, Scene #03
